name: Flow Dot
description:
Don't touch the lines!

A premise that seems simple, but you will have to use all your precision, reaction, puzzle solving and timing skills to beat this arcade challenge!

Well this looks easy

Get ready for:

  • 50 cleverly designed levels of increasing difficulty
  • 3 time records to beat for every level
  • a soothing jazz soundtrack to keep you relaxed
  • a minimalist, refined graphic style and slick motion design

Not so much anymore!
